overview: When the girls are nowhere to be seen, these guys go Str8 to Gay 4. Johnny Rapid just wanted the twins to show him how to play a video game, but the twins have different ideas and never play fair. When Phenix finds out that he won't be able to cum for two weeks after a vasectomy, he decides that he needs to shoot a farewell load, and who better to help him out than nurse Ayden Marx. Kirk Cummings always gets what he wants and right now that happens to be the straight guy making out with his friend in the bar photo booth. Sebastian and Gavin traded letters; although Sebastian went into jail, based off his letters to Gavin it is clear that he explored his sexuality while he was there. Sessions with a personal trainer can result is very interesting, especially when it's Jessie Colter and Joe Parker.
title: Str8 to Gay 4
